summary: The NuScale Power Corporation Deferred Compensation Plan for Non-Employee Directors allows eligible directors to defer receipt of compensation, such as Fee Shares or RSUs, until their separation from service, aiming to align their financial interests with shareholders. The plan is administered by the Organization & Compensation Committee and requires annual elections by December 31 of the preceding year, with elections becoming irrevocable once the deferral year begins. The plan adheres to Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code.
